trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting"></xref> events of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting"> </xref> eventos de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: By adding an event handler delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting> events, you can perform any additional preprocessing required or cancel the database command entirely.
trans-unit.target: Adicionando um delegado de manipulador de eventos para lidar com o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting>, ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting>eventos, você pode executar qualquer pré-processamento adicional necessária ou cancelar o comando de banco de dados totalmente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating>

trans-unit.source: Because the SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs class is derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> class, you can cancel a pending <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> database command by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Porque a classe SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs é derivada do <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>classe, você pode cancelar um pendente <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>comando de banco de dados, definindo o <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: You can examine and manipulate the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Parameters%2A> collection, and other command properties prior to running the command by accessing the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> object exposed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs.Command%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Você pode examinar e manipular o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Parameters%2A>coleta e outras propriedades de comando antes de executar o comando acessando o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>objeto exposto pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs.Command%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs.Command%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Parameters%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs class is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnUpdating%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnInserting%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnDeleting%2A> methods to provide access to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> database command before it is run.
trans-unit.target: A classe SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs é usada no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnUpdating%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnInserting%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnDeleting%2A>métodos para fornecer acesso a um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>comando de banco de dados antes de ser executado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnDeleting%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnInserting%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnUpdating%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control exposes many events that you can handle to work with the underlying data objects during the course of a data operation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>controle expõe vários eventos que você pode manipular para trabalhar com os objetos de dados subjacente durante o curso de uma operação de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the events and associated <xref:System.EventArgs> and event handler classes, to better guide you to the various events that correspond to the lifecycle of a data operation using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir lista os eventos e associados <xref:System.EventArgs>e classes de manipulador de eventos, para orientá-lo melhor para os vários eventos que correspondem ao ciclo de vida de uma operação de dados usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Event|EventArgs|EventHandler| |-----------|---------------|------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting> occurs before the data is retrieved.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting> occur before an insert, update, or delete operation is performed.|SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted> occur after the data retrieval, insert, update, or delete operations completes.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventHandler>|
trans-unit.target: | Evento | EventArgs | EventHandler | |-----------|---------------|------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting>ocorre antes dos dados serem recuperados. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting>ocorrer antes de uma inserção, atualização ou operação de exclusão é executada. | SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted>ocorrer após a recuperação de dados, insert, update ou operações de exclusão for concluída. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventHandler>|</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs"></xref> class, using the specified database command object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs"> </xref> classe usando o objeto de comando de banco de dados especificado.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object that represents the cancelable <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Update*>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Insert*>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Delete*> command.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"> </xref> objeto que representa o cancelável <> </> *>, <> </> *>, ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Delete*>comando.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Delete*>
Obtém o comando de banco de dados pendentes.

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting> event to examine and manipulate the properties of the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> before it is run by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: Você pode manipular o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting>, ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting>eventos para examinar e manipular as propriedades da <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>antes de ser executado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating>

trans-unit.source: The connection to the underlying data source is not yet open when the event handler delegate is called.
trans-unit.target: A conexão à fonte de dados subjacente não ainda estiver aberto quando o delegado de manipulador de eventos é chamado.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you cannot cancel the database operation by calling the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Cancel%2A> method on the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> object directly.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, você não pode cancelar a operação de banco de dados chamando o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Cancel%2A>método o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>diretamente do objeto.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, you can cancel the database operation by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, você pode cancelar a operação de banco de dados, definindo o <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>para `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object that represents the pending database command.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"> </xref> objeto que representa o comando de banco de dados pendentes.
